name: Chaos DJ
description:
The Chaos DJ has been taken from The Chaos Gods Come to Meatlandia and adapted for MÖRK BORG, in particular for the Album Crawl adventure anthology. 

Please only use this class if you are 100 percent okay with full-on gonzo gaming.

Included are four artistic options, including one to draw your own.

Chaos DJ is an independent production by Knight Owl Publishing and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.

MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.
